post:
Same specs in all 3 locations with 1 exception:

**OpenVZ 7**

* 1 CPU Core
* 256 mb Ram
* 3GB Disk Space
* 500 GB Transfer p/Month
* /64 IPv6 range (/80 in phoenix)
* 1 x NAT IPv4
* 20 ports forwarded + 1 dedicated pre forwarded ssh port.

If you want to use them for VPN I highly recommend @Nyr 's script: 

OpenVPN: https://github.com/Nyr/openvpn-install
Wireguard: https://github.com/Nyr/wireguard-install


Order link: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&bid=20

NOTE: You have to enter the details for 1 at a time, root password, hostname etc, just put ns1 and ns2 in the nameserver boxes they are irrelevent.

When you hit continue you will be taken to the next location.
